Riolu (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0446: Munchlax
Pokémon
#0448: Lucario →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Riolu (TCG Pocket).

Riolu has been featured on 24 different cards since it debuted in the Diamond & Pearl expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Riolu cards are normally Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Riolu

Riolu
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
